text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Butte Meadows |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = census-designated place |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_map = File:Butte County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Butte Meadows Highlighted 0609318.svg |map_caption = Location of Butte Meadows in Butte County, California |pushpin_map = California |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = |pushpin_map_caption = Location in California |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Butte County |subdivision_type3 = |subdivision_name3 = | population_total = 74 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = |population_density_sq_mi = 34.51 | population_density_km2 = 13.32 | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 2.14 | area_land_sq_mi = 2.14 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.00 | area_total_km2 = 5.56 | area_land_km2 = 5.55 | area_water_km2 = 0.00 | area_water_percent = 0.02 | area_note = |timezone = Pacific (PST) |utc_offset = -8 |timezone_DST = PDT |utc_offset_DST = -7 | |established_title = |established_date = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 1323 |elevation_ft = 4340 |postal_code_type = ZIP Code |postal_code = |area_code = 530 |blank_name = GNIS feature IDs |blank_info = 257772; 2612474 |website = |footnotes = ; }} Butte Meadows is a census-designated place (CDP) in Butte County, California. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in California Category:Settlements in Butte County, California
